sentences.en: But the linesman was close to what happened.
sentences.cn: 埃拉诺保持冷静,主罚点球,他显示了丰富的经验.”

sentences.en: Even if the linesman has doubts, he has to give advantage to the attacking team.
sentences.cn: 尽管边裁有疑问, 也应当保证进攻方的利益.

sentences.en: It wasn't awarded by the linesman, but by the referee from quite a distance.
sentences.cn: 这不是边裁判断的, 而是在很长距离之外的主裁判判的.

sentences.en: Liverpool scored, if you can say that they scored , because maybe you should say linesman scored.
sentences.cn: 利物浦进球了, 如果你能这样说的话, 因为也许你应该说边裁进球了.

sentences.en: Officials include a referee, an umpire, a scorer and four linesman.
sentences.cn: 裁判人员包括主裁判 、 副裁判 、 记分员各1名和4名司线员.

sentences.en: That football player appealed to the linesman.
sentences.cn: 那个足球运动员听取了巡边员的决定.

sentences.en: The 30-year-old Scottish international was sent off for arguing with a linesman.
sentences.cn: 这位30岁的苏格兰国脚因和边裁争执而被罚下场。

sentences.en: The linesman gave it despite Gallas being between him and the ball.
sentences.cn: 边裁不顾加拉挡住自己视线硬是判进球有效.

sentences.en: The linesman raised his flag to signal that the ball was out of play.
sentences.cn: 巡边员举旗示意球已出界.

sentences.en: The tennis players refused to accept the linesman's decision, so the judge ordered them to play that point over.
sentences.cn: 网球运动员拒绝接受巡边员的判定, 所以裁判员判他们重新比赛这一分.

sentences.en: This time, like a rocket [ the linesman raised his arm ].
sentences.cn: 但这次却像火箭 ( 边裁举旗 ).
